Certainly! Based on their interest in adventure movies, I would recommend the following two films from the list you provided:

1. The Revenant (2015): This historical action-adventure film directed by Alejandro González Iñarretaz features a star-studded cast including Tom Hardy, Leonardo DiCaprio, and Will Smith.

The film tells the story of John Fitzgerald "Jack" Ryan (Tom Hardy), a highly skilled former CIA officer who now works as an aide to President Jameson "Jim" Ryan (Leonardo DiCaprio).

When President Ryan is assassinated by a group known as "The Revenant": An American Soldier Sentenced to Life in Prison For Murders of Officers and Civilians, Returns Home To Find His Wife and Children Dead, And His House Burned Down.

After finding out who is behind the murders of his family members, Jack decides to take matters into his own hands and confronts the leader of this group, who turns out to be a former colleague from Jack's days at the CIA.

In a thrilling action-packed climax, Jack uses all his skills as a former CIA officer to defeat this group of criminals and save himself and his family from this deadly nightmare.
